title: Anna Faris and co-stars talk 80s rom-com remake 'Overboard'
text:
Anna Faris and co-stars talk 80s rom-com remake 'Overboard' 01:56
The cast of 'Overboard' discuss the reimagining of the classic 1980s rom-com, which starred Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell. Rough cut. (No reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
